survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Indoor Smart Gardening Systems
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of indoor smart gardening systems to understand satisfaction levels, usability, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with your indoor smart gardening system?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and easy interpretation.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with your indoor smart gardening system?

questions.question_text: Which features of your indoor smart gardening system do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture versatile usage patterns.

script.question_text: Which features of your indoor smart gardening system do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your indoor smart gardening system?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture detailed feedback on pain points.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your indoor smart gardening system?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your indoor smart gardening system to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your indoor smart gardening system to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future versions of indoor smart gardening systems?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather qualitative insights for product development.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future versions of indoor smart gardening systems?
